metadata.title: CVE-2022-22728 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw in Apache libapreq2 versions 2.16 and earlier could cause a bufferoverflow while processing multipart form uploads. A remote attacker couldsend a request causing a process crash which could lead to a denial ofservice attack.

criterions.comment: libapreq2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
